DOC.brief_summary: Combined spinal-epidural ( CSE ) analgesia become widely accepted approach provide analgesia labour pain . Despite increasingly widespread use technique , optimal intrathecal drug regimen establish yet . Several investigation use local anesthetic Bupivacaine , Levobupivacaine Ropivacaine CSE labour publish . But despite reintroduction Chloroprocaine recently n't investigation spinal chloroprocaine . Chloroprocaine already long-know drug beneficial pharmacodynamic/kinetic profile . It known quick onset action ( 2 - 3 minute ) , high efficacy , rapid metabolism plasma cholinesterases short half-life mother fetus . Because beneficial profile , Chloroprocaine widely use intrathecally surgical anesthesia . Several investigation demonstrate surgical anesthesia dos Chloroprocaine range 30 - 60 mg use effective surgical duration 40 - 90 minute . Despite `` standard '' surgical anesthesia , little known spinal Chloroprocaine dose regimen . Therefore primary goal study determine minimum adequate dose Chloroprocaine give spinally woman labour use CSE procedure . We use up-down sequential allocation identify median effective dose ( ED50 ) concentration ( EC50 ) . The Effective dose 95 % population ( ED95 ) estimate also up-down sequential allocation become important valuable approximation clinical dose .
DOC.brief_title: Determination Minimum Local Analgesic Dose Spinal Chloroprocaine Labour
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Pregnant woman labour gestational period 36 41 week ASA I II Primi multiparae Spontaneous induce labor Exclusion criterion : Pregnant woman labour receive opiate analgetics 6 hour period prior CSE
